title: Looking for high bronze-silver team
body:
Hey guys im b2 atm and im looking for some people to push past into silver and gold with hmu im on most of the time.

looking to improve my own skill through a team environment mic is plus

replies.body: add me for a game, i play top/jg usually, and im looking for the same thing
i'll join, i can play a tanky top lane Gnar, or a mid ahri, I went 27/3 Ahri
hey man I'm lookin for a team I was a s3 player until today we I was pushed down to bronze coz of bad teams
Add me in game, I'll play.

Honestly, do what I have done.

Give up.

Now come back in about 2 months when they have a fully operational solo queue.

How does it go?

Stop 1 - Quit
Step 2 - Wait for full solo queue
Step 3 - ???
Step 4 - Profit?

Seriously, unless you are good enough currently to get yourself out to gold in the dynamic queue, or you are joining a full 5v5 team in every game, all you are going to do is run into a better premade or smurfs and get your ass handed to you. Guaranteed the more I play ranked the more I realised very recently that it is mostly premades due to the team rewards they are offering and it doesn't work out to well for them.

If you are stuck at Bronze 2, honestly, wait until you either get yourself to silver at least, or wait for the solo queue, it will change the way the dynamic queue operates and will change how the teams work and you may think twice about joining a team once the solo queue gets done. You may actually end up playing better in the full solo queue and just push yourself through.

Here is my take on premade teams: You get 2-4 man premades in the 'solo' queue, they give no shits about anyone but themselves, fact. They will blame you or anyone else when the shit hits the fan, fact. One of the premades is ALWAYS shit, sometimes ALL the premades are shit, therefore they will literally only attack or do anything when they are together and ready themselves, therefore if they are falling behind, you lose. They will not group up and try to salvage the game and go for a win, they will just keep farming and sticking together until they feel it is time, by than, it is over.
